thread.title: Great location, clean and compact
thread.title_full: Great location, clean and compact - Review of The Gallivant Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: k_guk
title: Great location, clean and compact
text: Amazing location, we got a bargain for what we paid for the room. The hotel and and room were very clean. The room was very compact, smaller than we expected, as was the bathroom. However the air con worked great, the bed was comfortable, there were plenty of plug sockets, and the shower was great. Actually great value for money.
